texts.Description:Abp.Localization.DefaultLang: The default language of the application.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.Password.Requir: The minimum length a password must be.
The minimum number of unique characters which a password must contain.
If passwords must contain a non-alphanumeric character.
If passwords must contain a lower case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a upper case ASCII character.
If passwords must contain a digit.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.Lockout.Allowed: Whether a new user can be locked out.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.Lockout.Lockout: The duration a user is locked out for when a lockout occurs.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.Lockout.MaxFail: The number of failed access attempts allowed before a user is locked out, assuming lock out is enabled.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.SignIn.RequireC: Whether a confirmed email address is required to sign in.
Whether a confirmed telephone number is required to sign in.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.IsUserName: Whether the username can be updated by the user.
texts.Description:Abp.Identity.User.IsEmailUpd: Whether the email can be updated by the user.
texts.Description:Abp.Account.IsSelfRegistrati: Whether a user can register the account by him or herself.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.Host: The name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.Port: The port used for SMTP transactions.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.UserName: User name associated with the credentials.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.Password: The password for the user name associated with the credentials.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.Domain: The domain or computer name that verifies the credentials.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.EnableSsl: Whether the SmtpClient uses Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the connection.
texts.Description:Abp.Mailing.Smtp.UseDefaultC: Whether the DefaultCredentials are sent with requests.
